name: Data Quality Engineer
description:
We are currently looking for an experienced Data Quality Engineer to join one of our projects related to data validation built on the data coming from the data store or data lake.

You will be responsible for providing data warehouses, dimensional data marts and enterprise reports verification and validation as well as designing, documenting and performing data quality checks.

WHAT YOU’LL DO

  • Participate in the requirements gathering process and reviewing the detailed documentation to facilitate transition from mapping to loading the data into data repositories
  • Perform data warehouse, dimensional data mart and enterprise report validation and verification
  • Play the key role in the data governance processes including data preparation, generation, data obfuscation, data integration, data slicing, and data quality control
  • Communicate the data quality results and collaborating closely with other teams involved in the development process
  • Analyze, troubleshoot, and document problems/observations, and working with the project teams to identify the root causes and resolutions
  • Maintain QA environments, ensuring code synchronization with production
  • Contribute to the CI/CD process establishment
  • Support customer inquiries on data quality issues and data consumption
  • Adhere to and promote quality standards

WHAT YOU HAVE

  • Experience in data management, data integration and data quality verification
  • Understanding of Business Intelligence configuration management tools/processes
  • Background in data profiling
  • Familiarity with database design and implementation
  • Obligatory excellent SQL knowledge
  • Experience in troubleshooting, performance tuning, and optimization
  • Clear and concise verbal, written and interpersonal skills including the ability to work in a team
  • Knowledge of CI/CD principles and best practices in data processing
  • Analytical and problem-solving skills coupled with initiative and accountability
  • Familiarity with different software development methodologies
  • Intermediate (B1) and higher level of English

WE OFFER

  • Experience exchange with colleagues all around the world
  • Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills
  • Regular assessments and salary reviews
  • Social package: medical care, sports, family care
  • Free English classes
  • Opportunities for self-realization
  • Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
  • Flexible working schedule
  • Corporate and social events
